name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: Results-driven Test Automation Manager with over 9 years of experience in designing and implementing effective test automation strategies to optimize software quality and performance. Proficient in automation tools and frameworks such as **Selenium**, **JUnit**, **TestNG**, and **Cucumber**, with a solid understanding of CI/CD pipelines and integration with **Jenkins** and **Git**. Skilled in developing and executing test cases, mentoring teams, and leading cross-functional collaboration to deliver high-quality software solutions. Committed to driving technical excellence and enhancing user experience by focusing on accessibility and innovation.
